author: MSNBC.com
title: Pandemic: The Italian lesson
description: Italy was the first country hollowed out by the Coronavirus, a clear warning of what a pandemic could do to a free and open society. NBC Chief Foreign Correspondent Richard Engel speaks to those who tried to warn the world.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Doctors sound the alarm over lack of medication
description: Dr. Jeremy Faust, an emergency physician at Brigham and Women's Hospital in Boston, and Dr. Steve Corwin, CEO of New York Presbyterian, are in agreement over a lack of critical medications as they battle the coronavirus pandemic.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: NYC first responders battle outbreak in ranks as 911 call volumes skyrocket

title: Farming community buckles amid coronavirus pandemic

title: Ohio governor: Reopening state will be just as tough as...

title: Mayor De Blasio: New Yorkers now have to hold the line

title: This isn't a red state vs. blue state issue, cautions doctor

author: Msnbc
title: Team Trump makes 'political calculation,' puts burdens on governors

The White House first issued guidelines in response to the coronavirus pandemic on March 16, the same morning Donald Trump told a group of governors that they shouldn't necessarily expect material support from his administration.

source.name: MSNBC
